info.title: UndergraduateApplications
info.description: Undergradudate Applications Resource of the CES API

get.description: Returns a collection of CES Shared Admissions Undergraduate Applications

parameters.name: applicant_id
parameters.description: Applicant ID

parameters.name: field_sets
parameters.description: List which sub resources are to be returned

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Indicates a set of sub resources

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: Skip into a large collection to this item

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Return this many items of a large collection
